subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Christina Kim had seven top-10 finishes on the L.P.G.A. Tour last season and has five top 10s already this year. The reason, she says, is a a new putter.
snippet: Christina Kim had seven top-10 finishes on the L.P.G.A. Tour last season and has five top 10s already this year. The reason, she says, is a a new putter.
